Constructor Detail

HostPathCodecImpl

public HostPathCodecImpl(String servPath)
Constructs a new codec given the requested path from the client and the path of the swirl servlet
POST /some/path.html HTTP/1.1 /some/path.html
GET http://foo.bar/a.html HTTP/1.0 /a.html
HEAD /xyz?a=b HTTP/1.1 /xyz

Parameters:
servPath - the path of the swirl servlet
Method Detail

decodeHost

public String decodeHost()
Extract the peer host from a uri that has a peer hostname encoded in it. If no host is encoded, this method will return ""

Specified by:
decodeHost in interface HostPathCodec
Returns:
the actual host of the peer

decodePath

public String decodePath()
Extract the path from a uri that has a peer hostname encoded in it. The path will be to an underlying slide server on the peer

Specified by:
decodePath in interface HostPathCodec
Returns:
the actual path on the peer

encodeHostInPath

public String encodeHostInPath(String href,
                               String encodeHost)
Utility method that encodes a host URL in an href. The format is /the_href/some.file_on_host

Specified by:
encodeHostInPath in interface HostPathCodec
Parameters:
href - the href to hide the host in
encodeHost - the peer to get the host from
Returns:
the encoded href
